category: Click Boards > Power management > Battery Charger
name: mikroe.click.charger17
short_description: Charger 17 Click is a compact add-on board that provides a single-cell battery charging solution. This board features the RT9471, a 3A single-cell switching battery charger from Richtek. It is a highly-integrated battery charge and system power-path management device for single-cell Li-Ion and Li-Polymer batteries. The high-efficiency 1.5MHz synchronous switch-mode buck charger achieves up to 92% charge efficiency at 2A with 5V input and 3.8V battery.
